summary: THE VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION AND WHEN TRAVELING (IN MOTIONI) AT A LOW SPEED TURNING LEFT WITH A SHARP LEFT TURN THERE IS A POPPING NOISE IN THE STEERING COLUMN SECTION THAT YOU CAN BOTH HEAR AND FEEL.  IN FACT, THERE HAS BEEN OCCASION WHEN IT APPEARED TO ME THAT THE STEERING WHEEL APPEARED TO SOMEWHAT STICK OR BRIEFLY FREEZE, AGAIN IN THIS LEFT A HARD LEFT TURN AT A SLOW SPEED.   I TOOK THIS VEHICLE TO THE LOCAL GM DEALER TODAY, THE SERVICE MANAGER EVIDENCED THE SAME ISSUE; ALTHOUGH, HE DID NOT KNOW WHAT IS CAUSING THE PROBLEM SUGGESTING THAT I RETURN THE VEHICLE FOR THEIR SERVICE AND REVIEW OVER A DAY WHEN I CAN LEAVE THE VEHICLE WITH THEM.
